help-file.title: DEXTERITY
help-file.content: Dexterity is a measure of deftness and hand/eye coordination, the ability to use your hands well. It is the primary attribute of Rogues and Fighters. Assassins and Thieves require dexterity for skills such as "Backstab" and "Steal". Whereas, Fighter types need dexterity to successfully "Bash" their opponents.
